By Apocalypse on Saturday, January 7, 2006 - 07:20 pm:

A bit of a broader thank-you but I would like to thank Lisa for making this site what it is today. This is the only site I have ever seen where every fan can make a difference in the way the company makes the game and help others in the complex game of Monster Rancher. The list of accomplishments on this site is a mile long but many a time have we affected the game and without you none of it would have been possible (things that come to mind are DP's suggestion of buying in bulk and Someone's idea of having more than one monster). So thank you Lisa for making this site possible.

P.S. Sorry to whoever suggested multiple monsters for not remembering who you are and thank you too!
